channel.title: How much do you use Auxy when creating music?
channel.description:
Hi guys! I've been using Logic Pro X a lot lately and am feeling a bit like a traitor...:wink: I've also heard you guys talking about the other programs you use when making music, and I got to wondering...how many of you guys use other DAWs/programs besides/in addition to Auxy? Which of these applies to you?
[poll type=regular max=4 public=true] * I mainly use Auxy to create music, but use a DAW/other program to mix/master. * I use both Auxy and DAWs/other programs equally when creating music. * I mainly use DAWs/other programs when creating music, just using Auxy as a sketchpad for ideas. * I only use Auxy. [/poll]
